snippet: The pomegranate juice maker Pom Wonderful cannot stop a smaller rival from selling a pomegranate-flavored energy drink with a similar name, a federal court ruled.
abstract: Federal Judge Margaret M Morrow refuses to grant pomegranate juice maker Pom Wonderful an injunction against smaller rival labeled 'pom,' manufactured by Pur Beverages.
lead_paragraph: The pomegranate juice maker Pom Wonderful cannot stop a smaller rival from selling a pomegranate-flavored energy drink with a similar name, a federal court ruled.

headline.main: Pomegranate Juice Maker Loses Trademark Fight
headline.print_headline: Pomegranate Juice Maker Loses Trademark Fight
